response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which has the potential to revolutionize your business operations and significantly enhance your profitability. This unique offering is valued at $1,500,000 to us, reflecting its exceptional quality, innovative features, and long-term benefits. Considering its immense value, we are extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. We believe this represents an excellent investment that could pay dividends for years to come. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about how this product can be tailored to meet your specific needs.", "product_price": 1200000}
